text: Anage hige'za agri kemofo nona'a amanage hu'za asmi'naze, Mago ne'mo kampi eme tutagiha huranteno amanage huno tasami'ne, huramantegeta e'naza kini nera amanage huta ete ome asamiho, Ra Anumzamo'a amanage huno hu'ne, Israelia Anumzana omani'negenka Ekroni vahe havi anumzana Balzebabunteti antahintahia erikura huzmantanke'zma e'nazo? E'inahu kavukvama hu'nanana, hazenkema erinka tafete'ma mase'nampintira onkanamrenka tamage hunka frigahane huno hu'ne.
